page.title: 08The Schools
page.content: There are{three}schools in Duffield. Two of these are primary schools, the{Meadows}and the{William {Gilbert. The original endowment for the {William Gilbert}is now over 400 years old. The{William Gilbert}has three infant classes and four junior classes.The{Meadows}has two infant classes and five junior classes. The last school is the the { Ecclesborne}and that's a secondary school.It has six years and the first five years have six forms except for the third and fourth years which have seven forms.There are 72 teachers in the school. Many children come on buses to the school from the surrounding villages The two primary schools have a prize winning combined choir in 1985.
